channel.title: paper-review on std::bodun::blog
channel.description: Recent content in paper-review on std::bodun::blog

item.title: Whiz: Data-Driven Analytics Execution
item.description: This paper by UTNS lab appeared in NDSI 2021. It presents a data-analytics framework that decouples intermediate data from computations

item.title: In-Network Aggregation for Shared Machine Learning Clusters
item.description: This paper by Nadeen appeared in MLSys 2021. It presents an in-network aggregation framework called PANAMA for distributed ML training tasks. PANAMA has two components: (1) an in-network hardware accelerator with support for floating-point gradient aggregation; (2) a domain-specific load-balancing and congestion control protocol
